Example.Description: This example use the trim function to remove leading, trailing or extra spaces in the String.

Syntax.Expression:
(trim " this is
a test
to show how trim works with
#\newline character.")
Syntax.Returns: this is a test to show how trim works with #\newline character
Syntax.Hints: This function only removes extra spaces and also the #\newline character. To remove non-printable characters, use the clean function
